original: How many of you agree?

original: You can't get rid of it.
translated: Tu ne peux pas t'en débarrasser.

original: You don't really expect me to tell you, do you?
translated: Vous n'espérez pas vraiment que je vous le dise, si ?

original: I noticed him sitting with his back against the wall.
translated: Je l'ai remarqué, assis le dos au mur.

original: Her hobby is bodybuilding.
translated: Son passe-temps est sculpter son corps.

original: Ask questions.
translated: Pose des questions.

original: Tom giggled again.
translated: Tom a de nouveau ricané.

original: Tom didn't seem very busy.
translated: Tom ne semblait pas très occupé.

original: I don't know anyone who matches that description.
translated: Je ne connais personne qui corresponde à cette description.

original: That house is mine.
translated: Cette maison est la mienne.

original: It's natural for you to think so.
translated: C'est naturel pour toi de penser ainsi.

original: I wish to go to Hawaii.
translated: Je souhaite aller à Hawaï.

original: It's good to talk to you.
translated: C'est bon de te parler.

original: Is that a new perfume?
translated: Est-ce que c'est un nouveau parfum ?

original: Several buildings were on fire.
translated: Plusieurs immeubles étaient la proie des flammes.

original: The ESA put a satellite into orbit.
translated: L'ASE a mis un satellite en orbite.

original: She was working last night.
translated: Elle travaillait hier soir.

original: She followed him home to find out where he lived.
translated: Elle le suivit chez lui pour voir où il vivait.

original: What time did you wake up?
translated: À quelle heure vous êtes-vous réveillés ?

original: The people I work with are all very kind.
translated: Les gens avec qui je travaille sont tous très gentils.

original: I am glad to help you.
translated: Je suis ravi de t'aider.

original: I really don't want to talk about it.
translated: Je ne veux vraiment pas en discuter.

original: Where is the fat located?
translated: Où se trouve la graisse ?

original: Please write me a letter whenever you run into trouble.
translated: Si tu es en difficulté, écris-moi une lettre.

original: Let me borrow that.
translated: Laisse-moi emprunter cela.

original: What kind of books do you like?
translated: Quel genre de livres aimez-vous ?

original: Tom carried Mary on his shoulders.
translated: Tom porta Marie sur ses épaules.

original: He studies a lot but makes little progress.
translated: Il étudie beaucoup mais progresse peu.

original: She turned out the light so as not to waste electricity.
translated: Elle a éteint la lumière afin de ne pas gaspiller l'électricité.

original: Let's find Tom before Mary does.
translated: Trouvons Tom avant Mary.

original: My hands are stained with paint.
translated: Mes mains sont tachées de peinture.

original: I'm going to Izu over the weekend.
translated: J'irai à Izu pendant le week-end.

original: A bill came along with the package.
translated: Une facture accompagnait le paquet.

original: You don't need to leave immediately.
translated: Vous n'avez pas besoin de partir immédiatement.

original: I told you it was a waste of time.
translated: Je t'ai dit que c'était une perte de temps.

original: Are you the one who wrote this?
translated: Êtes-vous l'auteur de ceci ?

original: Were you out last night?
translated: Es-tu sorti hier soir ?

original: Is there somebody you want to talk to?
translated: Y a-t-il quelqu'un avec qui vous vouliez vous entretenir ?

original: Don't rely on him.
translated: Ne te fie pas à lui !

original: Pay attention to what I say.
translated: Fais attention à ce que je dis.

original: I spoke to him in English, but I couldn't make myself understood.
translated: Je lui ai parlé en anglais mais je n'ai pas pu me faire comprendre.

original: He is too busy dreaming dreams to plan what he will do in his old age.
translated: Il est trop occupé à rêvasser pour projeter ce qu'il fera lorsqu'il sera vieux.

original: You're careless.
translated: Tu es négligent.

original: I forgot to feed the fish.
translated: J'ai oublié de donner à manger au poisson.

original: I shouldn't have tried doing that by myself.
translated: Je n'aurais pas dû essayer de faire cela toute seule.

original: What a shame you weren't able to come.
translated: Quel dommage que vous n'ayez pas pu venir.

original: I'll be back in just a second.
translated: Je vais revenir dans une seconde.

original: We'll be serving complimentary drinks.
translated: Nous servirons des boissons gratuites.

original: She is no less beautiful than her sister is.
translated: Elle n'est pas moins belle que sa sœur.

original: I'm brave.
translated: Je suis courageuse.

original: Have you ever known me to be mistaken?
translated: M'avez-vous déjà vu me tromper ?

original: That isn't exactly what I said.
translated: Ce n'est pas exactement ce que j'ai dit.

original: She put out the light before she went to bed.
translated: Elle a éteint la lumière avant de se coucher.

original: We appreciate the support.
translated: Nous apprécions le soutien.

original: Tom has always been shy.
translated: Tom a toujours été timide.

original: Click here for more information.
translated: Cliquez ici pour de l'information additionnelle.

original: He was angry because of what she said.
translated: Il était en colère à cause de ce qu'elle avait dit.

original: Are your parents home?
translated: Est-ce que tes parents sont à la maison ?

original: Tell them who you are.
translated: Dis-leur qui tu es.

original: Guys! Wait!
translated: Les gars ! Attendez !

original: We are going to eat a lot tonight so I hope that you are not on a diet.
translated: On va beaucoup manger ce soir alors j'espère que tu ne fais pas de régime.

original: I'm one of the thirty people who want to do that.
translated: Je suis l'une des trente personnes qui veulent le faire.

original: Tom's distracted.
translated: Tom est distrait.

original: Mr. Brown, a friend from Oregon, will visit us tomorrow.
translated: M. Brown, un ami de l'Oregon, viendra nous rendre visite demain.

original: As long as we live, we have to work.
translated: Aussi longtemps que nous vivons, nous devons travailler.

original: I forgot to lock the door.
translated: J'oubliai de verrouiller la porte.

original: He is absorbed in his work.
translated: Il est absorbé par son travail.

original: He is incompetent.
translated: Il est incompétent.

original: She lives in London.
translated: Elle vit à Londres.

original: Tom was sitting near a very attractive woman.
translated: Tom était assis près d'une femme très attirante.

original: I'll join you later.
translated: Je vous rejoindrai plus tard.

original: It's still light outside.
translated: Il fait encore jour dehors.
